text:
Please check in the ooxml-schemas sources.
(this will bring POI into line with FAQ 14)
This should in the future be a standard task for committing a new release.
creator: apache@apconsult.de
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text:
We don't plan to do this as these are generated sources from the official schema definition for office documents and would bloat the stored source code a lot.

If you need it you can easily retrieve the POI source code (either via the published source package or from SVN) and compile POI to build the matching jar-file in the directory ooxml-lib.
Also, this is covered in the FAQ - http://poi.apache.org/faq.html#faq-N1012A
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
